itunes:title: #35: Sex as an Attachment Issue
title: #35: Sex as an Attachment Issue
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: If you've struggled with some issues with regards to your sexuality and sex life, it may be based on your attachment and unresolved trauma. I talk about the ways I've seen it show up in women here.      CONNECT WITH US...
itunes:summary:
If you've struggled with some issues with regards to your sexuality and sex life, it may be based on your attachment and unresolved trauma.

I talk about the ways I've seen it show up in women here. 


Take the sex survey, please!
